files.name: main.py
files.content:
#Averette, Carter - Mid Term program
print ('Planet Express Delivery Time Calculator')
print(' ')
planetname = input('What is the name of the planet?')
print(' ')
parsecs= input('How many parsecs away?')
parsecs=float(parsecs)
print(' ')
packages=input('How many packages?')
packages=int(packages)
print(' ')
weight=input('How many tons does each package weigh?')
weight=float(weight)

if (packages>=10 and packages % 2 == 1.0):
    print (' ')
    print (' ')
    print('Warning: Adjusting package count to', packages + 1)
    packages=packages + 1

tripOne=(packages * weight * parsecs + parsecs)

if(parsecs <1):
    print (' ')
    print (' ')
    print('Error', planetname, 'must be one or more parsecs away.')
elif(packages <1):
    print('Error: The ship must carry at least one package.')
elif(weight<=0):
    print('Error: The package weight', weight, 'is too light.')
    
else:
    print ('The total cargo weight is', packages * weight, 'ton(s).')
    print ('The trip to', planetname, 'will take', tripOne, 'minutes')
    print ('The trip back to Earth will take', parsecs, 'minutes.')
    tripTwo = (tripOne + parsecs)
    print ('The total trip time is', tripTwo, 'minutes.')
print(' ')
if(planetname == 'Robot Planet'):
    print ('Also, Bender is Great!')
